title: Another Case of a Spectator Behaving Badly at Liège-Bastogne-Liège Femmes
content:
Video: A rogue spectator disrupted Liège-Bastogne-Liège Femmes by briefly riding alongside the race leaders, the latest in a growing problem with fan behavior.

Read the full article at Another Case of a Spectator Behaving Badly at Liège-Bastogne-Liège Femmes on Velo.
author: ahood
